item.title: Walk The Moon - Shut Up And Dance
item.description:

Oh don’t you dare
look back
Just keep your eyes
on me
I said
you’re holding back
She said shut up
and dance with me
This woman is
my destiny

woo hu

and dance with me

of the night

kryptonite

to get together

and she said
